contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} {{Infobox Website | name = Quick Blog | url = http://www.godaddy.com/gdshop/blog/landing.asp | screenshot =<!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:Quick-Blog.png|200px]] -->| commercial = Yes | type = Blog hosting | registration = Optional | owner = [[Go Daddy|GoDaddy.com]] | author = [[Go Daddy|GoDaddy.com]] | }} '''Quick Blog''' is a hosted [[Blog|blogging]] service from [[Go Daddy|GoDaddy.com]]. It is offered free with ads for every domain name purchased or as a separate, subscription-based product. It debuted on December 16, 2005. The current version is 1.2.9. == Features == * Subscribe to entries or comments via email * Threaded comments * Comment showcase * Category autocompletion * Comprehensive statistics * WYSIWYG template editing * Drag and drop sidebar editing (the implementation is unique) * Entry locking == External links == *[http://www.godaddy.com/gdshop/blog/landing.asp Quick Blog marketing page] *[http://www.onlinequickblog.com/ Quick Blogging product blog] *[http://www.godaddy.com/ GoDaddy.com home page] *[http://mvolo.com/2006/11/07/free-nohassle-blogging-with-bill-browns-quick-blog.aspx Mike Volodarsky's blog on Quick Blog experiences] [[Category:Go Daddy]] [[Category:Blog hosting services]] [[Category:Blog software]] {{Website-stub}}
